text:
I boarded my two cats, Ollie and Ottie at Camp Kitty, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the experience! From the moment we arrived, the staff was welcoming, attentive, and truly cared about making my cats feel comfortable.

Ottie can be a bit shy and easily scared, but the team was so patient and gentle with him. Ollie, on the other hand, is more adventurous, and I loved that they provided plenty of playtime and enrichment for both of them. The facility was clean, cozy, and thoughtfully designed with cats‚Äô needs in mind. I also appreciated the regular updates and photos‚Äîthey really eased my mind while I was away.

If you‚Äôre looking for a safe, loving, and well-managed boarding option for your feline friends, I highly recommend Camp Kitty. Ollie and Ottie will definitely be visiting again and are already looking forward to their stay during Hari Raya! ‚ù§Ô∏è

Very caring, nurturing and accomodating caregivers. Spacious and clean environment for the furbabies.
Love the shop ambience too. Serene, tidy and modern looking. They sell various bites and pet needs, including the much needed vitamin.

The best thing about having our baby doing his staycayion here is that CAMP KITTY is CERTIFIED and TRAINED in managing pet care . So one less thing to worry about.

I have been sending my cats to Camp Kitty for boarding and grooming since 2022, and I can confidently say that Camp Kitty is one of the top cat hotels and grooming services around. The place is clean, and the cats are well taken care of. The staff are also very friendly. I‚Äôve previously sent my cats to other places, but the service was not as good as Camp Kitty. That said, I do hope Camp Kitty can extend their check-in and check-out hours. Also, I really hope they will open a new branch in the Permas area, please!

Came from Singapore to buy some cat grooming items and treats for my cats! Was surprise their rescue cats were very affectionate ( sadly I couldn't adopt and bring them home. üò≠ü•π) and the people were so sweet and kind towards me and my mom. Hope to come back again some day!
Our absolute trustworthy pet sitter. Very welcoming and clean environment. Professional groomers, fur baby smelling sooo good after each grooming sessions.
